Text:
Perfect quality, thanks a lot.
English full subtitles are the ones for deaf people so if you want normal subs you can use:
http://www.opensubtitles.org/fr/subtitles/4552834/john-carter-en
or
http://www.opensubtitles.org/fr/subtitles/4553862/john-carter-en
, timings are identical. 
About the movie it was really awesome. Visually stunning, entertaining, fast paced, great music, gorgeous lead actress,... I really don't understand why it didn't perform better at the box-office because it's way better than most movies. Definitely worth seeing.
Hey Zektorm Uploader, I want to know why dont u upload maximum number of films.......

GREAT QUALITY; but the alien language was not hardcoded so i couldnt paly the subtitles on my blu ray so had to hard code them myself. lost some quality but int he end THANKYOU!!! TRY MKV its the best.
